material.mattext: What does 'pixel' stand for in digital imaging?
What is the main function of JPEG in digital imaging?
Which format is widely used for video compression?
What is the purpose of a codec in multimedia?
Which of the following is a lossless image format?
What does 'bit rate' refer to in video transmission?
Amount of data processed per unit of time
In video streaming, what is buffering used for?
Storing data temporarily to ensure smooth playback
What is the key advantage of using H.264 for video encoding?
What does the term 'frame rate' refer to?
Number of frames displayed per second
Which term describes the number of distinct pixels in each dimension of a display?
What is the purpose of video transcoding?
Converting video files from one format to another
Which of the following formats is known for supporting animation?
What is a 'keyframe' in video compression?
A frame that serves as a reference point for subsequent frames
A frame with the highest resolution
A frame with the lowest bit rate
What does the term 'latency' refer to in video streaming?
Delay before data begins to be transmitted
In image representation, what does RGB stand for?
What is the main purpose of image compression?
Reducing the file size of images
A technique where each frame is split into two fields for faster refresh rates
A video with high bit rate
A video with a high frame rate
Which format is commonly used for high-quality digital photos?
What does 'aspect ratio' refer to in video representation?
Proportional relationship between the width and height of the video
Which term describes the process of sending video content over the internet in real-time?
What is a 'thumbnail' in the context of digital images and videos?
A small representation of a larger image or video
What is the purpose of metadata in multimedia files?
Providing information about the file, such as author and date
Which video format is widely used for web streaming due to its high compression and quality?
What does 'bit depth' refer to in image representation?
Number of bits used to represent each pixel
Amount of data processed per unit of time
Delay before data begins to be transmitted
What does 'compression ratio' indicate in multimedia files?
Ratio of the original size to the compressed size
Generating a final video output from raw footage
Which format is known for its support of transparency in images?
What is the purpose of a 'buffer' in video streaming?
Storing data temporarily to ensure smooth playback
Which of the following is a common resolution for high-definition video?
